unnormalised: Arre yaar, my electricity bill this month was shocking! Last month, it was around ₹2500, but this time it's ₹4875. I don't understand how it jumped so much. Maybe it’s because I used the AC more due to the heatwave in Delhi, or perhaps the meter reading on 15/07 was incorrect. Need to call BSES and complain; this is ridiculous. Consumption showed as 550 units, which seems crazy high for just one month. My neighbour's bill, living in a similar flat, was only 3000 Rs. Something is definitely fishy!
normalised: Arre yaar, my electricity bill this month was shocking! Last month, it was around rupee two thousand five hundred, but this time it's rupee four thousand eight hundred and seventy five. I don't understand how it jumped so much. Maybe it’s because I used the A-C more due to the heatwave in Delhi, or perhaps the meter reading on fifteenth july was incorrect. Need to call B-S-E-S and complain; this is ridiculous. Consumption showed as five hundred and fifty units, which seems crazy high for just one month. My neighbour's bill, living in a similar flat, was only three thousand rupees. Something is definitely fishy!
